name: @basiclines/rampa-sdk
description: Programmatic JavaScript SDK for generating color palettes with rampa

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile=./dist/index.js --target=node && tsc -p tsconfig.declarations.json && cp dist/sdk/src/*.d.ts dist/ && cp -r dist/sdk/src/formatters dist/formatters 2>/dev/null; rm -rf dist/sdk dist/src

author: ismael.fyi
